website_summaries.verdict: Get a full doctor-prescribed medication without leaving your house.
pros: Between a topical solution, SHT shampoo, conditioner and biotin multivitamin, this subscription provides the best opportunity to prevent hair loss and enable potential hair regrowth
Delivered monthly, no Dermatologist visit required
cons: More expensive than a single product approach

customer_reviews.title: this was amazing! I lost my daughter and my hair started ...
customer_reviews.text: this was amazing ! I lost my daughter and my hair started falling out to where it looked I was going through chemo, I tried different shampoos but this was the only one that gave results and I saw a difference almost immediately , fine hairs growing in quickly ! makes your hair feel lustrous and thickened ...I will use this always as my daily shampoo ...this is a must try for thinning hair !! I do not do many reviews but this I had to share cause it was effecting my self esteem , now I feel good about my hair and its very shiny and healthy looking .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: My hair has been the healthiest it has ever been!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoos for a couple of years now and my hair is the healthiest it has ever been. I have Lupus and struggle with keeping my hair from falling out and regrowing. This has worked great for me. The last bottle I bought has felt like it’s not really shampooing your hair because it does not give a lot of lather but it still works! I also have the conditioner and that just puts your hair health over the top!
customer_reviews.author: MomentsToEnjoy

customer_reviews.title: I am almost done with my first bottle and I gotta say I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Wow it actually works. I am almost done with my first bottle and I gotta say I love this shampoo. It lathers really well so you don't have to use much. I will definitely be reordering. My hair has gotten thicker and filled in nicely. Shampoo also has a nice smell to it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This is a great quality product - GREAT SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: I have thinning hair and have tried so many shampoos on the market. I decided to try this one based on reviews I read and I have to say with the first shampoo I felt a difference. My hair is looking and feeling good and I threw out all the unused bottles of shampoos I had been holding onto. I don't know if truly stops hair loss but it definitely has made my hair fuller and manageable. I would recommend it for anyone who has struggled to find a shampoo that works for thinning or unmanageable hair. I am in my 50's and my hair has changed over the past 5 years. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Healthy hair. Less fall out.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple weeks now and I definitely feel and see a difference in my hair. It is not longer falling out in clumps. Prior to using this, I would wake up tons of fall out on my pillow and bed. It would also come out in clumps in the shower. Now I barely get any fall out. Too soon to see if I have new growth but having my hair not fall out in massive amounts is good enough for me. Also made my hair extremely soft and shiny. I've paired this with the art natural argan hair mask. Really glad I gave this product a try.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Every time I washed my hair more and more hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Every time I washed my hair more and more hair was accumulating on the drain. It took a couple of weeks, but I noticed less and less hair falling out. Most of the time there is no hair at the drain.
customer_reviews.author: CarolJ

customer_reviews.title: Guess they changed the formula
customer_reviews.text: This is like my 2nd/3rd time buying this product and the results are pretty good, but this 3rd round is different from the other 2 times. It's thin and watery in comparison to the other times I've purchased this product, it's now putting me on the fence about buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients drastically changed.  Missing anti-androgen ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: It's missing the anti-androgen ingredients and it's missing caffeine as well, which stimulates hair growth. So, there is no chance this stuff will grow hair at this point. Art Naturals? What have you done?
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I received was good but the last bottle smelled and felt like car wash so there must be quality control issues with this product. I’m hoping this is an isolated incidense and they replace my purchase with a good bottle as the first bottle did leave my hair feeling well conditioned.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Seller sending watered down version
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this shampoo twice. The first time, it was amazing. Thick and foamy. It lasted a long time. The most recent shipment I got was obviously watered down. I even had the two shampoo bottles to compare because I ordered before I ran out. I had to use more shampoo to get the same effect and the bottle lasted half as long. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: GoBlue

customer_reviews.title: JUNE 16, 2019 and SEPTEMBER 1, 2019. BEFORE AND AFTER
customer_reviews.text: I know I know my scalp looks horrible! But this stuff works for me! The pictures with less hair was taken on June 16, 2019 and the after math of using this product till September 1,2019. I have grown some hair back and I notice my hair follicle are bit thicker. Plus whenever I'm taking a shower LESS hair are falling out! Give this product a try I'm not a paid reviewer or anything.ALSO use the conditioner too as it is important.
customer_reviews.author: Lingling

customer_reviews.title: False advertising regarding ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought this shampoo and conditioner a few months ago and was very happy with both products. However, I just purchased another bottle of this shampoo and was very upset to read the ingredients on my bottle didn’t match up with the ingredients listed on this product site AT ALL! I sent it back. I’m very disappointed with the product and Amazon should hold Artnaturals accountable for false advertising!
customer_reviews.author: JeffnCindy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Not what you will expect
customer_reviews.text: Somebody is now selling a bait and switch product on Amazon. All the printed information - name (hair loss therapy), ingredients, use description is what I expected to buy, but the photo and product is entirely different (argan oil &vit E). Totally different!
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Perpetually Itchy Scalp; will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Somewhar dissapointed with this product. I have been using it regularly 2-3x a week to avoid over washing. It dries out my scalp, and results in itchy flakiness. It does help to smooth my frizzy fine little hairs, but only for about 1 day. I have been using it with the conditioner, and I actually feel like my fine, thin hair has thinned during the time I've been using it - though I obviously can't blame it solely on the product. But I haven't noticed any benefits that outweigh the costs (dry, itchy. intensely scented.)
customer_reviews.author: gmvaldez

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The artnaturals Argan Oil Shampoo Hair Growth Treatment is a great product to use for thinning hair. It really has helped my hair to grow longer at a faster rate. I've not seen new hair growth but it strengthens the hair so less of it falls out. I've tried other products that have the same claims but this one really works. My co-worker frequently comments about how much body my hair has. The fullness this shampoo creates makes my hair feel and look thicker. The oils in it make my hair feel soft and look shiny. It also has a great smell. I plan on using this shampoo for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost two years now and I absolutely loved it. Before using this shampoo, every time I brushed my hair or take a shower I see a handful of my hair falling. This prompt me into looking for a shampoo that might be able to help with my falling hair and it worked. I can now see a big difference in my hair. I can see plenty of new hair growing. I love how it smelt good and felt good in my hair and scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great value, would recommend-Argan Oil Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this long enough to see a difference in growth, however, it does make my hair look healthier and I do notice less breakage. I will continue to use as long as it lasts and possibly purchase again as I like the ingredients in this product. The only issue I realize now as I am writing this is that I'm using this along with an organic hair growth oil, so the results would not be based on solely this product. But the combination I am using now seems to work for me (less breakage, healthier look). Everyone is different, so at minimum this product has value and would recommend trying to see if fits your needs.
customer_reviews.author: charley78

customer_reviews.title: Good Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My friend had been using this shampoo for quite sometime and I had been skeptical to purchase. However I decided to give it a try. She bragged about how much she loved it and how she thought it helped with hair loss. I love the shampoo. After the first washing my hair felt thicker and more manageable. I have only used it for a few weeks, but I don't seem to be loosing as much hair. I would recommend this shampoo if you are searching for a great shampoo for thinning or thin fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA M FULLER

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for about 9 months. I with I would have taken a before and after picture because the results have been incredible. My hair has grown back in places I was balding, and it has seemed to speed up my hair growth too because My hair has grown a ton. It also feels much thicker. It did take some time to figure out how much to use. I have thin straight hair and could only use a little and no conditioner after or my hair would feel greasy. I wash my hair every 2-3 days and 1 bottle has lasted me for about 9 months!
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been using Art Naturals Argan shampoo for some time. Its given my hair a really great natural softness to it. It cleans without drying your hair out and overall seems to be a fantastic hair product that I’ll continue to use. I know, you’re probably a little worried about the price, but it lasts me (25yr old male)about 3 months a bottle. I started using this shampoo because I’ve been noticing my hair falling out. I haven’t noticed too much change with the amount of hair falling out, but it certainly is an awesome shampoo! Certainly, it’s worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Ireceived and ordered this shampooh based on reviews plus I love Argan Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have my hair back! Ireceived and ordered this shampooh based on reviews plus I love Argan Oil. It has made my hair like my hair used to be! Meaning, it is not dried out and dead looking/feeling and FLAT. It really is a miracle worker and I've really been distressed about my hair thining. It looks and feels thicker already. We'll see if I get new hair growth as others have stated in the reviews. You just need a dime size amount and I leave it in for 5 min. (not a big deal) AND I rinse w/WARM WATER. It's the best I've found and I've tried MANY.
customer_reviews.author: skinner1

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT REGROW MY HAIR
customer_reviews.text: I used this shampoo faithfully every 2 - 3 days, and did not use any other shampoo. It DID NOT regrow my fair. In fact my hair continued to fall throughout the process. The only good thing I can say about this shampoo is that it smells really great. That's what the 1 star is for. As far as regrowing hair, or preventing existing hair from falling, it did not do either. I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Nice shampoo and I do have some hairs growing back in on my hair line, but no earth-shattering hair re-growth. I take what I can get. Just not to lose the hair permanently is great. I have female pattern baldness. My hair started to fall out when I was 15. Genetic.
customer_reviews.author: The Bad Person

customer_reviews.title: Not great for fine and thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: Whether or not the product works, I can not attest. I’m using a few other supplements so this is hard to determine. But what I can say is that this shampoo leaves my hair limp and much oilier faster. I typically wash my hair every 3-4 days with other products. Even after just styling out of the shower, my hair is limp and by the next day it won’t hold any styling. I’d not recommend this for fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: fiercepapillon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This review is in exchange for product, but I wouldn’t be writing unless I had faith in the product. This shampoo (and conditioner) have made such a huge difference in not only the health of my hair and scalp, but has undoubtedly led to new hair growth. Long term stress makes my hair fall out like crazy. Within 2 weeks of using this product, I saw new growth along my hair line and temples where it had been visibly thinning. I’m now on my second bottle of shampoo and the results are still coming. I have a million tiny new hairs sticking straight out all over, but I’m so thankful to see them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Love

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and the consistency of ingredients is pleasant
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product from amazon but had issues with delivery. Not there fault. However. I found this same product at a beauty supply company where I live and I purchased a bottle. It smells great and the consistency of ingredients is pleasant.. However, I'm waiting for my hair to come back. It's been a month. I guess the answ er is the hair club for men.
customer_reviews.author: Fadhil Putra

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great shampoo so far. I’ve been using it and the conditioner every day for roughly 2 months and here are the pros and cons: Pros: My hair smells really good! My hair has filled in places it was beginning to thin around the top of my scalp. My hair smells really good! I have noticed some regrowth at the peaks of where my hairline was receding. My hair smells really good! (Did I mention my hair smells really good) Cons: It’s pretty expensive, but understandably so. The regrowth in some places is still mostly ultra fine short hairs that fall out intermittently (I expect they will fill in without more time). Overall a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING HAIR LOSS PREVENTION PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to grow my hair long and one of the downsides Is having my hair thinned out in the process. I know there are many hair thickeners out there but not many that are organic and all natural. Being that I am a health freak I only buy all natural hair and body products. I've been looking around for the best one and found this shampoo. It's absolutely amazing!! It smells great and really helps with hair loss and hair thickening. It's all organic too! It makes my hair silky and luscious. I would definitely recommend this shampoo to anyone looking for a natural solution to prevent hair loss!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair soft but very limp
customer_reviews.text: My hair strands are not fine, they are of medium thickness and somewhat wavy/frizzy. But I am losing my hair. This shampoo makes my hair really soft but way too limp. This is bad news for thinning hair. It’s flat to my head no matter what other styling products I add. If you have really coarse, thick or unmanageabke hair, you might like the results. I didn’t notice any change in hair growth after 3 months of use nor did my boyfriend. We’re going to try a basic gently shampoo and add rosemary oil to it. I’ve read that this is a natural remedy for hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Bagby

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended product to everyone, works Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact it works instantly and you can notice the results right away. It makes your hair healthier, heavier, shiny and naturally silky. It also helped me grow my hair longer as well. I had few bald spots before using this product but after 2-3 weeks after using this product it amazedddd me. I fell in love with this product because it did it’s magic. Infact my mom sister and my wife are using this product as well now. We all love it and recommend everyone to use ut as well. It truly works, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product just simply amazing! My hair were thining since I gave birth ...
customer_reviews.text: This product just simply amazing! My hair were thining since I gave birth to my youngest son in 2009. Very stressful everytime I realized that I has loose so much hair (everyday). I had tried so many different products of shampoo, hair treatments, biotins capsules etc. Nothing works! Finally I tried this shampoo, and I won't trade it for anything else! It works like magic after 1st used. I complitely happy with it. And using this product everyday (because I wash my hair everyday after my workout and sauna routines). Once again, thank you for the maker of this product👏🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Maringka

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this shampoo! It makes my hair so soft and nice looking. I have also notice that I don't have as much hair loss anymore! That has made me very happy!!! I don't know about the regrowth as I haven't been using long enough, but so far, I am very happy with this product and have high hopes that hair will regrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got Thinning Hair?  This Product Words FAST For New Hair Growth
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, they are not kidding about new hair growth. I have been using this product for over a month, about every 3 days. My hair was thinning, but no longer. Styling with a hair dryer and brush is so easy now. The formula is so thick and rich, it only takes a dime sized drop for each side of head. Even my hair stylist noticed my thicker hair. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John Roth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo. After the first wash, I noticed that my hair didn't shed as much as it did before using this shampoo. I wouldn't recommend leaving it on for the recommended 3-5 minutes if you have afro textured hair. Just use like regular shampoo and you should be fine. This is my first bottle of this type of shampoo, and I do plan on buying another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo but not really effective against hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I finished the bottle to write a review about it. The shampoo does smells very nice, it does leave my hair clean and not oily/greasy or too dry its right there in the sweet spot and it does help with volume. As a shampoo it is indeed a very good shampoo, now for the hair regrowth part I'm not so sure about it. Used it daily for over a month and couldn't note any difference in terms of hair loss or hair regrowth. Perhaps it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Escorcia

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: My favourite shampoo now! Love it as it has no Sulfates or Parabens. I’ve bleached my hair multiple times for balayage , got both highlights and lowlights , single dyes and was experiencing a lot of damage and hair fall, this shampoo and its conditioner worked wonders for me and I’ve purchased 2 more bottles in advance Incase they run out soon online. Hands down , the best shampoo available right now and that also at a cheap price comparatively
customer_reviews.author: Ansah Zubair

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Good moisturizing shampoo with clean ingredients. Has a decent pleasant smell. Made my hair soft after every wash. I usually follow the shampoo with Art naturals conditioner or mask. Wish it had an essential oil added to give a fresh smell. Havent noticed a big difference in the growth of hair yet.
customer_reviews.author: Small_town_girl

customer_reviews.title: This works for me ... Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. It takes a little while, but I have seen growth in where I once was losing hair (typical male baldness at crown). My stylist noticed growth since I started using this, and I will continue to use it. Plus, it smells great (the shampoo AND my hair)! Just be patient ... This really does seem to help a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: GMan in The OC

customer_reviews.title: I'm taking to try to curb hair loss. I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking to try to curb hair loss. I'm 63 and post menopausal. Progesterone cream was helping a lot but I was fearful of it increasing my chance of acquiring cancer so I discontinued. We'll see if this helps at all.
customer_reviews.author: Janet F. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo on my granddaughter who is 8 years old. She has very fine hair and I think that it is never too early to begin to treasure one of your most valuable assets. Her hair does look better after each washing. Very happy to have purchased this product
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Maroney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shampoo that works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is really Awesome! 💖! My mom is a super big big BIG fan. She was having some hair loss and after she started using this shampoo notice her hair began to regrow and strengthened. So let's just say my mom has been hooked ever since. We have purchased it through Sarah Kahns store...seriously the Best!!! Great customer service, super quick shipping and fantastic product! 💖!
customer_reviews.author: L. C

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft this leaves my hair! I bought it due to my hair falling out after having my 2nd son. It has only gotten worse over the last 3 years. I have noticed my hair seems fuller after 3 weeks of using it! I am also noticing a decrease in the amount of hair in the shower drain after each shower! Hoping it continues to work!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the last bottle I received as the consistency is that of water. This is not what I remember last time I ordered it. I don’t appreciate paying this amount for what appears to be a very diluted product.
customer_reviews.author: Styler

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone!!
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to have made my scalp much more sensitive and I actually experienced more hair loss unfortunately /: Be careful, and do your research! I have switched to another natural shampoo and added in my own mixture of rosemary,lavender and cedar wood oils that works very well on my scalp without irritating it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica r.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Helping
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this shampoo once a week for 6 months now and can finally tell a difference when I look in the mirror so I decided to do a comparison picture and I’m floored. I felt like it was helping my hair regrow but now I know it is! I haven’t tried any other shampoos that claim to help regrow hair so I can’t say if this one is any better or not, but IMO there isn’t a need for me to try any others.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Sumners

customer_reviews.title: Creates Healthy Hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is all I need to keep my hair healthy. Almost two years ago, I decided to train my hair to only need washing once a week. Now, it took about a month for the oil on my scalp to adjust, but once it did, I’ve had soft, silky hair ever since. I don’t even need conditioner. My hair has also gotten fuller and the thinning places are filling in. I just now had to buy my second bottle. It’s lasted that long. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this shampoo for a week so I don't know about the hair regrowth part but I do know that my problem spots of thickened callus like skin tingle when this product is used. They tingle in the same way as when I apply the prescription scalp treatment. I will update re hair growth after a few more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: klew

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about one month. So far so good, would not expect miracle to happen over night, and to be honest, have not put too much faith in any currently available product for hair loss treatment. However, I will probably continue using this product for reasons: 1. Phycologically I would still hope products like this would help improve my hair condition; 2. You will need shampoo anyway, and this product at least does not give you any harm (also at a decent price); 3. Plus who knows if it indeed improves your condition with a long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Volume and shine.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using this product for a couple of years now, and have been contacted by the seller to write a review in exchange for one. I don’t think that this product causes you to regrow hair, but I like that it gives my hair volume and shine. For the quantity it is also a good price for quality shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: candt

customer_reviews.title: Must have, my go to!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is super soft and shiny! I get tons of compliments. I’ve used this shampoo for years (about 5yrs) and my hair is so healthy and long. I live that it doesn’t have the harsh chemicals. It also smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: The way I figure it, I just started using this shampoo, and every time I use it my scalp feels so good. It feels great even after the second day my scalp feels wonderful. So again, the way I figure it, even if the shampoo doesn't help to regrow hair I will continue use of said product just because of the quality of the product. Will recommend to every one I know.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but I feel it is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd bottle of this shampoo now. Unfortunately I didn't think far enough in advance for before and after photos but as an everyday user I can say it makes my hair soft, not heavy and to me definitely appears fuller. I admit the price is way high for shampoo but I pay it because I feel it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: I have to start by saying that the customer service is excellent! Very fast shipping, ordered 2 days ago and got it right away! The product itself smells really good and it last quite a while because you don’t have to use a lot of the shampoo for it to clean your hair. After first use, your hair does feel softer but I would need to use it for a few months before I can tell that my hair feels thicker and stronger. Overall I like this shampoo and I hope to get more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Best my hair has looked in 20 years
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best shampoo I’ve used to try and grow thicker fuller hair. I’m a 45 year old woman with hereditary thin hair, and this shampoo has been a miracle worker. I’ve been using for more than six months, and I’ve seen an incredible growth of new hair and thickening overall. I’m a convert from expensive boutique brands, and I’ll never go back. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this shampoo, but I decided to take a chance - worst case it would only clean my hair. I was very pleasantly surprised. After a few shampoos, I felt like less hair was coming out. After a few weeks, the new hair growth was pronounced. It was almost like I was developing bangs. I has to ask my stylist how to manage all the baby hairs coming in. As an added bonus, it smells really nice! I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lelly

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo for all types of hair!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo does wonders to my hair. I feel like my hair has gained in volume although I'm not certain if it has physically grown using the shampoo. Just have to make sure to lather it up and let it sit on the hair for a few minutes to allow the hair to saturate with the shampoo. It leaves my hair feeling smooth and smelling fresh, using it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Pleb

customer_reviews.title: ... hair back but it sure makes your hair feel good and smell good
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it enough to see if it grows my hair back but it sure makes your hair feel good and smell good. I really like it and will use it for my shampoo from now on. I can say my hair quit falling out while using this shampoo. Only used it for a couple of weeks though.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Z Zellars

customer_reviews.title: Super drying,  increased hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Super drying. Followed all directions leaving in my hair as recommended before rinsing. More of my hair fell out than normal after a couple of uses. Returned product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great for Damaged Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have blonde bleached highlights and a perm on caucasian hair, this shampoo gently cleans my hair without drying it. My sister used it when was visiting and her hair was soft, curly and shiny after using it. She wanted to know what kind of shampoo it was. I would purchase this again. It lasts a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: P in PA

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Honest review here no paid or whatsoever. The shampoo is nice it does not make my hair oily which i like and a plus for me! The smell is good too nothing too herbally or medicine like smell. I wish the bottle is bigger. My only main concern is its ingredients, although they claim to be natural and free of parabens (which i think it is, did not spot any paraben ingredients) is that they have so many ingredients. My thoughts are only, if it is natural there should be less chemical included on the shampoo. But I will be doing another review of this on my blog if you are interested at lafleurmadame.wordpress.com
customer_reviews.author: mspiggy

customer_reviews.title: no improvement after one month
customer_reviews.text: I'm not totally bald. I'm just started to slowly lose my hair and noticed that it became thinner. I don't see any improvement after one month of regular daily usage of it. I think it will not work. 2 stars for now. I'll try to update after some time, maybe something will change UPD:8 month usage I've noticed that my hair became thicker and better overall. However, it leads to subtle itching and dandruff. 4 stars for now.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo for over a year now consecutively and will continue to purchase. I've had some hair loss due to years of using the flat iron and I've seen great results using this shampoo. It will help stop hair loss and will make your hair grow much more faster. Definitely give it a try! Update: 4/22/19 Still Ioving it! I purchased 2 bottles as a gift for my parents and they really like it too. My dad says he can tell a difference in his hair loss :)
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Product Review - 1 Year In
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review in exchange for free product; however we have used this product for almost a year and all opinions are my own. I originally bought this product for my husband's thinning hair. He used the product and we didn't see a dramatic difference, but the thinning seemed to stop. After about a year attempted to use a different product and almost immediately I noticed more thinning. We switched back to this product and things seem to be stabilizing again. Giving 4 stars because the product is helpful, but I had hoped it would encourage hair regrowth.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Fuller Looking & Softer Hair but delivers short.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely makes your hair feel softer and definitely makes it look fuller. I have not experienced any hair regrowth whatsoever though. I haven’t even seen a cessation of hair loss either. I definitely think this is a decent product but it’s not a miracle worker and don’t think anyone should expect it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: The smell its soo good, also make my hair super soft and shiny and help a lot with the frizz, i have so dry hair and this give me much more moisturizer that i need! I need to try it again to see the “re growth skill” that its claim.
customer_reviews.author: Monica H. Bello

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a good sized bald spot after several pregnancies. This shampoo helped fill my bald spot in, I can't find it back now! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I started using this shampoo after I lost a lot of my hair from a medication side effect. My hair grew back relatively quickly and I love how it leaves my hair clean. I’ve been telling friends and family that they need to try this shampoo n conditioner. I’ve actually had compliments about how healthy my hair looks 😊 My hair stylist even asked what I was using. Shouldn’t couldn’t believe how fast my hair turned around.
customer_reviews.author: StJens

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!  It's not for regrowth of hair!
customer_reviews.text: It's described as a hair growing shampoo. IT SAYS ABSOLUTELY NOTHING ABOUT HELPING HAIR GROWTH OR RESTORING HAIR GROWTH ON THE LABEL AT ALL . THAT'S FALSE ADVERTISING !!!
customer_reviews.author: Allen W. Bauck

customer_reviews.title: Open bottle with no seal and different formula than pictured
customer_reviews.text: My seal was broken on my shampoo in addition that it was not the hair loss shampoo pictured- I will be returning the item and am disappointed as I wanted to try this shampoo - I would give zero stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo works!!! Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this shampoo for months. This stuff works. It made my hair fuller, more bouncy and shining. It makes your hair thicker, healthier, stronger. The only thing is your hair grows so fast you might need to get your hair cuts more often haha which is a great problem to have. The shampoo smells amazing and I always get compliments on how good my hair smells and how shiny it is. I tried many Argan oil products as I find its best for my highlighted blonde hair, but even compared to more pricey brands this shampoo is better by far. Highly recommend for hair volume, shine, detangling and overall healthy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Lee

customer_reviews.title: Slowly improving!
customer_reviews.text: Thinning hair has made me very self conscious. I had been hating every picture of myself. I am about 3/4 through my first bottle and ordered another one. It is not a magical cure, but it is better. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo!!! It works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shampoo. I am in my 60’s and have always purchased my hair products from the salon where I get color and cuts, so I have always used quality products. Lately my hair has been thinning and I decided to try art naturals hair regrowth shampoo. I have been using it for about 3 weeks now and have noticed that after washing my hair, when combing I no longer am losing hair in my comb. Also my hair has more body and shine and is much easier to blow dry. I will continue to use this shampoo because it works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fairall

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I don't personally need it, but I got it for my husband. He has a good head of hair but noticed his hair starting to look very stringy and limp. His hair used to be fluffy and thick looking but the water wear we live now is somewhat "hard" and is not good for fine hair like this. We got a hard water filter but it didn't seem to do anything. As soon as he started using this we both noticed his hair regaining it's nice full fluffiness! It looks very good and full and not limp and stringy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Aveda Invati line (shampoo, conditioner, tonic) to help with my hair loss. This is a more affordable option...works just as well, my hair looks full and soft, and no additional tonic needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this specific product recently (I got the hair-regrowth to help with my postpartum hair loss), but have been using the regular formula shampoo. I like that it has a nice scent, is free of sulfate and parabens and overall has been good for my scalp. Would recommend, and am hoping that it will help with quick hair regrowth.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Smells super good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold on this brand.. Being 41 my hair is definitely thinning.. I think this shampoo is helping, or at least has helped keep it from feeling thinner. Besides that, it smells really good, I'm not sure how to describe it, it smells sexy but I'm not sure if it is feminine sexy or just unisex sexy.. haha... I'll keep buying it, especially now that my girlfriend is using it too..
customer_reviews.author: Heath G.

customer_reviews.title: Tangles up Hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible for fine hair! It makes my hair feel awful when it is in, and after rinsing it out (yes I kept it in 2-5 min. in the sauna!) and it knots up the hair like crazy! Thankfully a ton of conditioner helped get the knots out. Nobody else mentions this, I can't understand why? Not sure if longer use is better but with that happening, I'm scared to continue using it. Very sad as all the comments are pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice shampoo but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shampoo and the smell is good. After using it for over 3 months, I however did not notice any improvements over helping my hair growth. Maybe I am just too stressful in life. I am still on the fence when it comes to these argan oil or tea tree type shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Bearicus

customer_reviews.title: It has worked great reducing the gray in my hair
customer_reviews.text: It has worked great reducing the gray in my hair. I use it two or three days a week, lathering it up and leaving it in for a couple of minutes, and washing it out. My first bottle lasted an entire year, I'm hoping this one lasts just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Moran Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Shine and health
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Smells amazing. Has really helped me get body and shine to my thin, and over processed hair. Feel much confident when styling my hair. I've received many compliments for how shiny my hair looks. Also makes my hair look much much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Bboston20

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve experienced hair loss so I’ve tried a combination of things. Shampoo, conditioner, and supplements. Argan oil is amazing for hair and skin. I can’t say Ive had a tremendous amount of hair growth from this product but I think it’s contributing to no more hair loss and great looking and feeling hair
customer_reviews.author: linlin

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this stupid product, it's fake.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake and does not help hair regrowth at all. Do not buy and save your money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Try it you will love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow if you are looking for a shampoo that gives your hair a thicker look this is it. I have thin, fine hair and this is an amazing product that truly adds volume, I will keep my beauty arsenal stocked with this shampoo because I will never use anything else!!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: It leaves my hair super shiny and soft!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is great! I haven't used it long enough to know if it helps with hair growth, but so far, there has been no extra shedding. A lot of the reviews are saying that it's dry but for me, it rinses out super soft and my hair is shiny and manageable once it dries! One downside is that it doesn't lather as well since it's sulfate free but what I do is completely wet my hair and lather up the shampoo with water before applying to my scalp. I am using this every other day! Hopefully it helps promote some hair growth!
customer_reviews.author: Yoo

customer_reviews.title: not for me.
customer_reviews.text: does not really work for me, an old man. I think nothing works well for age related loss. It smells like ordinary shampoos. I wish it smelled more herbal. Update: I bought another bottle and the photo on the web page is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo, would recommand!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of shampoo that I have purchased and I would recommand this brand.After starting to use this shampoo, my appears shinier and seemingly healthier/thicker.My scalp appears to be less visible in thinning areas. As far as regrowth of hair ,I have been using this product for over a year and have not experienced any noticable regrowth. Having said that, I would still recommand. The overall look and health of my hair has improved after adding this product in my shower routine.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pliska

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only been using this shampoo for a couple of weeks. It has made my hair fuller and thicker feeling. I haven't noticed much hair growth since using it but I'm sure that will take more time.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Significant decrease in hair loss. Noticed a slight improvement in volume as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been losing my hair a lot for a few of years and all attempts to stop it were not quite successful before I purchased this amazing product! This shampoo is truly magical! After a year of use hair is noticeably fuller, and I have lots of baby hair too. And it’s organic. Makes my hair nice and shiny. Will keep using it for sure and recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed thinning hair a year or so ago. I've been using this shampoo in conjunction with the matching conditioner since. I haven't noticed any further thinning, and my hair seems so much healthier now it looks like a have more hair, and that's all that matters I suppose. They did a new formula which seems a little thicker and lathers better than the previous formula which I think is an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: UC Student

customer_reviews.title: I love how soft it left my hair
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft it left my hair. It is too early to decide if it has helped hair loss, but, it definitely feels good on my scalp. I do recommend giving this shampoo a chance to see how it leaves your hair. I will up-date this review later as to if it helps hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Humbracht

customer_reviews.title: Greatly reduced hair loss
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I was losing my hair at a rapid clip and within a month after using this my hair loss dramatically decreased. Won’t use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. Has a great smell and leaves your hair feeling soft and smooth after washing. I've noticed a substantial difference in the amount of hair left in the tub after showering.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Nice shampoo for scalp problems.
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. Even better in the dry winter as it keeps my scalp from drying out. I have thick hair but suffer from scalp psoriasis. This is great from problem scalps.
customer_reviews.author: Karli E.

customer_reviews.title: this product I got not as good as what I
customer_reviews.text: I order the wrong Shampoo and I called for Exchange and u had to do this and that and this and that well it was my fault cause what I read looked alike what I had so when I got the Shampoo I seen it was the wrong kind I wanted artnaturals Argan Oil Shampoo - Hair Loss Prevention Therapy so, it was going to be a hassle to exchange so after talking to the Amazon Lady I though well I just keep the product. this product I got not as good as what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: james bratton

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this product for a couple of years and thinks his hair is fuller and thicker. He definitely will continue using it!
customer_reviews.author: from Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Works very well when you take care of other health aspects
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for growing hair.The ingredients make sense.For best results,you must shampoo everyday to remove DHT build up.Eating right,regular exercise & proper sleep are factors too.
customer_reviews.author: Mclaine23

customer_reviews.title: Drying, not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I have never spent this much on a shampoo but after reading all of the great reviews I thought "why not go for it?". I have fine wavy hair and this was drying. And it seemed to weigh my hair down. Maybe I am the exception but I do not like this shampoo. Back to Pantene moisturizing shampoo, works better, less $$.
customer_reviews.author: Techblukat

customer_reviews.title: nothing positive to say
customer_reviews.text: Certainly did nothing to help with hair thinning. Drug store cheap shampoos worked and felt much better. I forgotten how much I had paid for this so I just threw away the remainder and was happy I did so
customer_reviews.author: obnoc

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and very well
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shampoo! My hair was dry and brittle from over dying but a week after using the shampoo and conditioner I noticed a huge difference. My hair is breaking less and feels so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ArtNaturals Argan Hair Growth Shampoo - (16 Fl Oz / 473ml) - Sulfate Free - Treatment for Hair Loss, Thinning & Regrowth - Men & Women - Infused with Biotin, Argan Oil, Keratin, Caffeine
product_meta.description:
Whether you’re male or female, noticeable hair loss is upsetting. ArtNaturals Argan Oil Shampoo Hair Growth Therapy can help. Infused with regenerative argan oil, aloe vera, white willow bark, burdock root, rosemary, and thyme, this shampoo stimulates cell renewal and healthy growth as it revitalizes hair follicles and supports a healthy scalp. Thicker, shinier hair returns!

Our hair loss shampoo fights male pattern baldness with natural, botanical oils and extracts. It aids in restoring thinning and dull hair, and helps prevent further hair loss. You’ll add volume and texture while revving your scalp and hair follicles back to younger days.

A major cause of hair loss is the body’s production of “dihydrotestosterone,” or DHT. This androgen causes hair loss by cutting off the blood supply to hair follicles. They eventually die—and hair falls out. ArtNaturals Argan Oil Shampoo Hair Growth Therapy contains multiple DHT blockers that help prevent this damage and loss.

One of these is caffeine. Studies have shown that caffeine is an effective stimulant of the hair shaft, and that used on scalp and hair, aids in faster growth. Then, the botanical oils and extracts go to work to hydrate, smooth and sooth hair.

Argan oil, pressed from the nut of the Moroccan argan tree, is often called “liquid gold,” and is worth its weight hair care gold as it is chockfull of fatty acids and Vitamin E. Add to that the cooling and anti-inflammatory properties of white willow bark, the iron, potassium, and amino acid of burdock root, and the proteins from wheat, oat and quinoa found in ArtNaturals Argan Oil Shampoo Hair Growth Therapy—and you’re ready to wash, dry and start being happier with your healthier, thicker hair.
feature_bullets: HAIR GROWTH : A blend of Argan oil, Aloe Vera, Rosemary and many other key ingredients will help stimulate cell renewal and healthy growth as it revitalizes hair follicles and supports a healthy scalp. Thicker, shinier hair returns

HAIR LOSS : A major cause of hair loss is the body’s production of “dihydrotestosterone,” or DHT. This causes hair loss by cutting off the blood supply to hair follicles. ArtNaturals Shampoo and Conditioner Hair Growth Therapy contains multiple DHT blockers that help prevent damage and hair loss.

ALL HAIR TYPES : The natural botanical oils and extracts go to work to hydrate, smooth and sooth hair. This scientific formula is suitable for all hair types including thick fine and normal density hair as well as straight wavy or curly hair textures.
STRENGTHEN AND PROTECT : In addition to hair growth and hair loss, this formula is specially designed to strengthen and protect your hair from thinning, split ends, breakage and more.

SULFATE AND PARABEN FREE : Our regrowth shampoo and conditioner set is non:GMO, hypoallergenic, sulfate free and paraben free providing the safest and most natural therapeutic hair growth shampoo set on the market
